abstract: Ten Thousand Things, nonprofit theater troupe founded by Michelle Hensley, has inspired other companies with its efforts to bring productions to marginalized audiences at prisons, homeless shelters and other unconventional locales.
lead_paragraph: Ten Thousand Things, a nonprofit founded by Michelle Hensley, brings Shakespeare and Brecht to prisons and homeless shelters.

headline.main: Theater Troupe Gives Those on the Margins a Front-Row Seat
headline.print_headline: On the Margins, With a Front-Row Seat

snippet: Ten Thousand Things, a nonprofit founded by Michelle Hensley, brings Shakespeare and Brecht to prisons and homeless shelters.

keywords.value: Ten Thousand Things Theater Co (Minneapolis, Minn)
